# [Project Name]

> [One-line description]

## Current Focus
→ TASK.md

## Documentation Map

### Always Read
- TASK.md: Active tasks (~200t)
- This file: Navigation index (~300t)

### Read When Needed
- CHANGELOG.md: Recent changes (last 2 weeks)
- CONTEXT.md: Design decisions, key insights

### Guides
- docs/BEST-PRACTICES.md: Workflow & model routing

## Agent Workflow
1. Read this file → orientation
2. Read TASK → what to do
3. (Optional) qmd query for deeper context
4. Work → update TASK + CHANGELOG (with #tag + identity)
5. Weekly: Maintainer archives + aggregates patterns

## Model Roles
- **Lead** (High-capability/$$$): Architecture, decisions, task breakdown
- **Engineer** (Balanced/$$): Development, execution, review
- **Maintainer** (Cost-effective/$): Archive, cleanup, weekly aggregation

## Rules
- TASK current < 200 tokens
- CHANGELOG < 2k tokens (archive after 2 weeks)
- One-line changelog entries, always include #tag and by {model}
- No secrets in any file
